sense.gloss: shade, shadow
behind (something), other side, back
background, behind the scenes, behind someone's back
gloom (in someone's expression, nature, etc.), darkness
haze (esp. in spring), mist
dimness (of sight)
shadow, shade, shading, gloom
nuance, shades of meaning, subtleties
shadow (e.g. on someone's happiness), cloud, shade, gloom
to become misty, to become hazy
to get blurry, to grow dim
to be overshadowed, to be upstaged, to be outshone
silhouette, dark shadow
black cataract, amaurosis
shadow, gloom
to become clouded, to darken, to get dark, to become hidden (behind clouds)
to darken (of a face)
to worsen, to deteriorate, to become gloomy
to raise (esp. overhead), to brandish (e.g. sword), to flourish
to wield (e.g. power, authority), to proclaim one's principles

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑陽気↑↓ようき↓で↑軽↑↓かる↓い↑男↑↓おとこ↓より、ちょっと↑翳↑↓かげ↓のある↑渋↑↓しぶ↓い↑男↑↓おとこ↓に↑惹↑↓ひ↓かれるの。
sdata.e: Rather than light-hearted and cheerful men, I'm attracted to sober men with a bit of a dark side to them.

sdata.j: 「↑若↑↓わか↓さ」の↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑不可能↑↓ふかのう↓も↑無↑↓な↓ければ、↑陰翳↑↓いんえい↓も↑無↑↓な↓い、それは↑一切↑↓いっさい↓を↑突破↑↓とっぱ↓する↑力↑↓ちから↓であり、↑一切↑↓いっさい↓を↑明↑↓あか↓るくする↑太陽↑↓たいよう↓である。
sdata.e: To "youth" there is neither impossibility nor gloom. It is the power that overcomes everything, the sun that brightens everything.
